CustomField.formula: IF( Flights_Ticketed__c ,'HasFlightsTicketed','NoFlightsTicketed')&' / '& IF( Flights_ticketed_by_UJ__c ,'IsUJ','NotUJ')&' / '& IF( Cruise__c , IF( Cabins_Booked__c > 0,'HasCruiseBooked', 'HasCruise') ,'NoCruise')&' / '& IF( Order_Customisation_Count__c >0,'HasCusto','NoCusto')&' / '& IF( Total_Payments__c >0,'HasPayment','NoPayment')&' / '& IF( COVID_Prepayments_Count__c >0,'HasPrepayments', 'NoPrepayments')
CustomField.label: BER Helper
